title: 790RP mystery gift
body: I just tried to give one to a mate and its not working, is this suppose to be working now or is it not till a later date?

replies.body:
yes, it has the same error as if i send a normal mystery to him but have already sent him 5 on the same day.

we trade mysterys alot but have not for several days so i know he has not got 5.

But yea, its the same error

Thank you.
Thats the same issue that I am seeing.
We are currently investigating, I will update this thread once I have more information.

already sent you one this week you cheeky lill %%%% :P haha 

{{summoner:21}}
Just closing this one off guys, the Mystery Chest is working correctly, it looks to be a caching issue that was delaying the correct settings showing in the client for this to work.
